product_name: Brooks NightLife Podium Half-Zip Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Built with performance fabric, reflective highlights and vivid color, the women's Brooks NightLife Podium half-zip top enhances your visibility during workouts in dim light. Quick-drying polyester fabric wicks moisture to keep you comfortable during exercise. 9.5 in. zipper allows for cooling ventilation. Reflective detailing increases your visibility to motorists and can be seen from any angle. Thumbholes in cuffs keep sleeves in place during motion and allow sleeves to extend over top of hands for extra warmth. The semifitted women's Brooks NightLife Podium half-zip top is not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: Built with performance fabric, reflective highlights and vivid color, the women's Brooks NightLife Podium half-zip top enhances your visibility during workouts in dim light.
